creator: Property Finder
descriptionHtml:
Property Finder is the Middle East's #1 property site to help you find the perfect home. Be able to search thousands of available options for properties to buy and rent, from apartments to villas, townhouses, penthouses, compound, offices, and plots of land.

See a property you like? Then you can reach out to the listing agent via Phone, SMS or Email straight from the app.

Property Finder's wide selection of services are available across the UAE, Bahrain, Qatar, Egypt, Saudi Arabia, and Lebanon. Browse in your native language with English and Arabic support, you will be sure to find the right home for you.

Features:

Filters
Go ahead, get super-specific: Customise your search using filters like number of bedrooms, price, size, and amenities. Search by community, sub-community, tower, and building in your preferred location, and select from a wide range of property types from apartments to villas, townhouses, penthouses, compound, offices, and plots of land.

Property Details
Find all the necessary property details in one simple screen

Virtual Tours:
Unable to attend a property in person? The app now supports virtual tours of our property listings. If the agent has filmed a digital tour of the property, you’ll be able to see it on the property details page.

Map Search
Not sure which building? Use our nifty Map Search to navigate around a neighborhood, and see the number of listings per building, or check out properties around you.

Floorplans & 360 Views
Want to know what the property will look and feel like? Browse our floor plans and 360 views to see the scale and inside the property.

Save your property
Not quite ready to commit, save your favourite properties across all your devices or share listings you like with anyone using various channels including whatsapp and social media.

Alert me
Don't miss out on new homes being added every day. You can set custom alerts for real time property updates.

Price Trends
Is the price good? How does it compare to the rest of the market? Don't worry we have this covered as our price trends feature can help you understand this.

Building Reviews
Found the location, but want to know what is building like and whether you want to live there? Check out our building reviews showing more information. .

Mortgage Finder
For those looking to buy, you can quickly get access to our Mortgage Finder tool searching over 20+ lenders to find out the best mortgage for you.

Find out more about us at https://www.propertyfinder.ae/

Follow us on Facebook (https://www.fb.com/propertyfinderuae), Twitter (https://twitter.com/property_finder), Instagram (https://www.instagram.com/propertyfinder) or drop us a line over at apps@propertyfinder.ae and tell us what you think about our app.

Go ahead, get super-specific: Customise your search using filters like number of bedrooms, price, size, and amenities. Property Details
Find all the necessary property details in one simple screen

Virtual Tours:
Unable to attend a property in person? The app now supports virtual tours of our property listings. If the agent has filmed a digital tour of the property, you’ll be able to see it on the property details page.

Map Search
Not sure which building? Use our nifty Map Search to navigate around a neighborhood, and see the number of listings per building, or check out properties around you.

Floorplans & 360 Views
Want to know what the property will look and feel like? Browse our floor plans and 360 views to see the scale and inside the property.

Save your property
Not quite ready to commit, save your favourite properties across all your devices or share listings you like with anyone using various channels including whatsapp and social media.

Alert me
Don't miss out on new homes being added every day. You can set custom alerts for real time property updates.

Price Trends
Is the price good? How does it compare to the rest of the market? Don't worry we have this covered as our price trends feature can help you understand this.

Building Reviews
Found the location, but want to know what is building like and whether you want to live there? Check out our building reviews showing more information. .

title: Property Finder

creator: Property Finder
descriptionHtml:
Property Finder is the Middle East's #1 property site to help you find the perfect home. Be able to search thousands of available options for properties to buy and rent, from apartments to villas, townhouses, penthouses, compound, offices, and plots of land.

See a property you like? Then you can reach out to the listing agent via Phone, SMS or Email straight from the app.

Property Finder's wide selection of services are available across the UAE, Bahrain, Qatar, Egypt, Saudi Arabia, and Lebanon. Browse in your native language with English and Arabic support, you will be sure to find the right home for you.

Features:

Filters
Go ahead, get super-specific: Customise your search using filters like number of bedrooms, price, size, and amenities. Search by community, sub-community, tower, and building in your preferred location, and select from a wide range of property types from apartments to villas, townhouses, penthouses, compound, offices, and plots of land.

Property Details
Find all the necessary property details in one simple screen

Virtual Tours:
Unable to attend a property in person? The app now supports virtual tours of our property listings. If the agent has filmed a digital tour of the property, you’ll be able to see it on the property details page.

Map Search
Not sure which building? Use our nifty Map Search to navigate around a neighborhood, and see the number of listings per building, or check out properties around you.

Floorplans & 360 Views
Want to know what the property will look and feel like? Browse our floor plans and 360 views to see the scale and inside the property.

Save your property
Not quite ready to commit, save your favourite properties across all your devices or share listings you like with anyone using various channels including whatsapp and social media.

Alert me
Don't miss out on new homes being added every day. You can set custom alerts for real time property updates.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Thank you for using Property Finder, we've now integrated verified information with Rega for consumers in Saudi Arabia.

title: Property Finder

creator: Property Finder
descriptionHtml:
Finding a home 🏠 in the Middle East has never been easier than with Property Finder. Whether you're buying or renting, you want a villa or a flat, we have it all.

Property Finder searches properties throughout the UAE, Bahrain, Qatar, Egypt, and Saudi Arabia and includes English and Arabic support. With homes and real estate, including apartments, flats, studios, villas, townhouses, and more, as well as plots of land and even offices 🏢 and shops, we'll help you find exactly what you're looking for. And when you do, Property Finder puts you in contact with the agent via phone, SMS, email, or WhatsApp.

Don't see what you're looking for? No problem! Take the stress out of searching by letting Property Finder App do it for you. Saved searches remember your requirements and will notify you when a property that matches them becomes available for sale - we'll make sure you never miss that perfect property again.

Property Finder is full of features that are designed to take the hassle out of finding a property - whether that's a new house or somewhere to start a business.
Some of those features include:

• Properties Filters 🔎 and Maps that make it easier to weed out the properties that don't meet your needs while highlighting those that do. Filters include the number of bedrooms 🛏️, bathrooms 🛁, price, location, and much more.
• Saved Searches ❤️ that take criteria from your filtered searches and save them for future use - and we'll even send you a notification when a property matching your needs is listed.
• Digital Tours mean you don't need to leave your home to find a new one. If an agent has provided a digital tour, we'll show it to you in Property Finder.
• Price Trends 📈 and Building Reviews ⭐ ensure you have the information you need before committing to a property. We'll show you how a home or office compares to the rest of the market while telling you how other residents feel about the building.
• Floor Plans & 360-degree Views give you a full picture of the property you're considering.
• Quick and easy ways to get the ball rolling. See a property you like? Get in touch with the agent directly via phone, SMS, WhatsApp, or email without hunting for their contact details online.

And that's just the start! You can download the app for free and learn more about Property Finder:
✓ UAE 🇦🇪: https://www.propertyfinder.ae
✓ Egypt 🇪🇬: https://www.propertyfinder.eg
✓ Qatar 🇶🇦: https://www.propertyfinder.qa
✓ Saudi Arabia 🇸🇦: https://www.propertyfinder.sa
✓ Bahrain 🇧🇭: https://www.propertyfinder.bh.

You've never been closer to the property of your dreams!
descriptionShort: Apartments, Villas, Houses & Offices for Rent, Buy or Sale: Find your Home today

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Middle East's #1 property app is updated! We continue to refine the app to make it an even smoother and optimized home search experience for you.

What's new?
• We've spent the last seven months rewriting Property Finder using the latest mobile technologies.
• Besides a much faster and streamlined interface, you can now search for your future home using dark mode.

Has our hard work paid off? Tell us what you think by leaving a review.

title: Property Finder - Real Estate

creator: Property Finder
descriptionHtml:
Finding a home 🏠 in the Middle East has never been easier than with Property Finder.
Whether you're buying or renting, you want a villa or a flat, we have it all.

Property Finder searches properties throughout the UAE, Bahrain, Qatar, Egypt, and Saudi Arabia and includes English and Arabic support. With homes and real estate, including apartments, flats, studios, villas, townhouses, and more, as well as plots of land and even offices 🏢 and shops, we'll help you find exactly what you're looking for. And when you do, Property Finder puts you in contact with the real estate agent via phone, SMS, email, or WhatsApp.

Don't see what you're looking for? No problem! Take the stress out of searching by letting Property Finder App do it for you. Saved searches remembers your requirements and will notify you when a property that matches them becomes available for sale - we'll make sure you never miss that perfect property again.

Property Finder is full of features that are designed to take the hassle out of finding a property - whether that's a new house or somewhere to start a business.
Some of those features include:

• Properties Filters 🔎 and Maps that make it easier to weed out the properties that don't meet your needs while highlighting those that do. Filters include the number of bedrooms 🛏️, bathrooms 🛁, price, location, and much more.
• Saved Searches ❤️ that take criteria from your filtered Property searches and save them for future use - and we'll even send you a notification when a property matching your needs is listed.
• Super Agents 🌟 A SuperAgent is a super-qualified agent who will provide you with an easy and hassle-free home-seeking journey. SuperAgents are property seeker obsessed, always looking to provide the best quality property listing and respond faster than any other agents to the home seeker’s needs, You are the reason behind bringing SuperAgents to life, as our primary goal is to empower you to find your new home easily, quickly, and effortlessly. This feature is only available in UAE.
• Verified listings ✅ Verified Property listings to ensure that the pictures you’re browsing on the property finder app is the same as the property, with predefined verification steps done for you.
• Quick and easy ways to get the ball rolling. See a property you like? Get in touch with the real estate agent directly via phone, SMS, WhatsApp, or email without hunting for their contact details online.

TYPES OF PROPERTY LISTINGS
Buy, rent, or invest in the real estate market with Property Finder:
✓ Studios, Flats & Apartments (1 BHK, 2 BHK,...), Duplexes, Penthouses,
✓ Villas & Townhouses, Compounds,
✓ Lands & Plots,
✓ Commercial Properties (Offices, Warehouses, Shops, Buildings),
✓ Short-Term and Long-Term Home Rentals,
✓ Furnished or Unfurnished Properties...

Find great investment opportunities in the housing sector, whether for ready-to-move-in properties or a long-term investment. See our huge portfolio of properties built or off-plan for sale.

Property Finder, Your House Finder, helps you to find the best property from developers and real estate companies or agencies.

And that's just the start! You can download the app for free and learn more about Property Finder:

✓ Qatar 🇶🇦: https://www.propertyfinder.qa

title: Property Finder - Real Estate

creator: Property Finder
descriptionHtml:
Finding a home 🏠 in the Middle East has never been easier than with Property Finder.
Whether you're buying or renting, you want a villa or a flat, we have it all.

Property Finder searches properties throughout the UAE, Bahrain, Qatar, Egypt, and Saudi Arabia and includes English and Arabic support. With homes and real estate, including apartments, flats, studios, villas, townhouses, and more, as well as plots of land and even offices 🏢 and shops, we'll help you find exactly what you're looking for. And when you do, Property Finder puts you in contact with the real estate agent via phone, SMS, email, or WhatsApp.

Don't see what you're looking for? No problem! Take the stress out of searching by letting Property Finder App do it for you. Saved searches remembers your requirements and will notify you when a property that matches them becomes available for sale - we'll make sure you never miss that perfect property again.

Property Finder is full of features that are designed to take the hassle out of finding a property - whether that's a new house or somewhere to start a business.
Some of those features include:

• Properties Filters 🔎 and Maps that make it easier to weed out the properties that don't meet your needs while highlighting those that do. Filters include the number of bedrooms 🛏️, bathrooms 🛁, price, location, and much more.
• Saved Searches ❤️ that take criteria from your filtered Property searches and save them for future use - and we'll even send you a notification when a property matching your needs is listed.
• Super Agents 🌟 A SuperAgent is a super-qualified agent who will provide you with an easy and hassle-free home-seeking journey. SuperAgents are property seeker obsessed, always looking to provide the best quality property listing and respond faster than any other agents to the home seeker’s needs, You are the reason behind bringing SuperAgents to life, as our primary goal is to empower you to find your new home easily, quickly, and effortlessly. This feature is only available in UAE.
• Verified listings ✅ Verified Property listings to ensure that the pictures you’re browsing on the property finder app is the same as the property, with predefined verification steps done for you.
• Quick and easy ways to get the ball rolling. See a property you like? Get in touch with the real estate agent directly via phone, SMS, WhatsApp, or email without hunting for their contact details online.

TYPES OF PROPERTY LISTINGS
Buy, rent, or invest in the real estate market with Property Finder:
✓ Studios, Flats & Apartments (1 BHK, 2 BHK,...), Duplexes, Penthouses,
✓ Villas & Townhouses, Compounds,
✓ Lands & Plots,
✓ Commercial Properties (Offices, Warehouses, Shops, Buildings),
✓ Short-Term and Long-Term Home Rentals,
✓ Furnished or Unfurnished Properties...

Find great investment opportunities in the housing sector, whether for ready-to-move-in properties or a long-term investment. See our huge portfolio of properties built or off-plan for sale.

Property Finder, Your House Finder, helps you to find the best property from developers and real estate companies or agencies.

And that's just the start! You can download the app for free and learn more about Property Finder:
✓ UAE 🇦🇪: https://www.propertyfinder.ae
✓ Egypt 🇪🇬: https://www.propertyfinder.eg
✓ Qatar 🇶🇦: https://www.propertyfinder.qa
✓ Saudi Arabia 🇸🇦: https://www.propertyfinder.sa
✓ Bahrain 🇧🇭:https://www.propertyfinder.bh.

You've never been closer to the property of your dreams!
Property Finder, Your Home Finder!

Whether you're buying or renting, you want a villa or a flat, we have it all.

Moving from UK, US, India or Pakistan to UAE or another GCC countries ? Property Finder searches properties throughout the UAE (Dubai, Abu Dhabi...), Bahrain, Qatar, Egypt, and Saudi Arabia and includes English and Arabic support. With homes and real estate, including apartments, flats, studios, villas, townhouses, and more, as well as plots of land and even offices 🏢 and shops, we'll help you find exactly what you're looking for. And when you do, Property Finder puts you in contact with the real estate agent via phone, SMS, email, or WhatsApp.

Don't see what you're looking for? No problem! Take the stress out of searching by letting Property Finder App do it for you. Saved searches remembers your requirements and will notify you when a property that matches them becomes available for sale - we'll make sure you never miss that perfect property again.

HOME SEARCH APP FEATURES
Our Properties App is full of features that are designed to take the hassle out of finding a residential or commercial real estate - whether that's a new home or somewhere to start a business.
Some of those features include:

• Properties Filters 🔎 and Maps that make it easier to weed out the properties that don't meet your needs while highlighting those that do. Filters include the number of bedrooms 🛏️, bathrooms 🛁, price, location, and much more.
• Saved Searches ❤️ that take criteria from your filtered Property searches and save them for future use - and we'll even send you a notification when a property matching your needs is listed.
• Super Agents 🌟 A Super Agent is a super-qualified real estate agent working for a real estate company or agency who will provide you with an easy and hassle-free home-seeking journey. This feature is only available in UAE.
• Verified True listings ✅ Verified Property listings to ensure that the pictures you’re browsing on the property finder app is the same as the property, with predefined verification steps done for you.
• Quick and easy ways to get the ball rolling. See a property you like? Get in touch with the real estate agent directly via phone, SMS, WhatsApp, or email without hunting for their contact details online.

TYPES OF PROPERTY LISTINGS
Property Finder helps you find the best residential or commercial properties in Dubai and other cities. Find real estate near you in every community or emirate including:
Buy, rent, or invest in the real estate market with Property Finder:
✓ Studios, Flats & Apartments (1 BHK, 2 BHK,...), Duplexes, Penthouses,
✓ Villas & Townhouses, Compounds,
✓ Lands & Plots,
✓ Commercial Properties (Offices, Warehouses, Shops, Buildings),
✓ Short-Term and Long-Term Home Rentals,
✓ Furnished or Unfurnished Properties
✓ Off-plan properties, New Projects & Developments

Find great investment opportunities in the housing sector, whether for ready-to-move-in properties or a long-term investment. See our huge portfolio of properties built or off-plan for sale from top developers such as Emaar, Damac, Nakheel, Danube...

Property Finder, Your House Finder, helps you to find the best property from developers and real estate companies or agencies.

And that's just the start! You can download the app for free and learn more about Property Finder:
✓ UAE 🇦🇪: https://www.propertyfinder.ae
✓ Egypt 🇪🇬: https://www.propertyfinder.eg
✓ Qatar 🇶🇦: https://www.propertyfinder.qa
✓ Saudi Arabia 🇸🇦: https://www.propertyfinder.sa
✓ Bahrain 🇧🇭:https://www.propertyfinder.bh.

You've never been closer to the property of your dreams!
